properties.name: resource.implementation
properties.description: The implementation for the underlying ResourceService, default 'simple'

properties.name: population.resourceProvider
properties.description: The implementation for the resource pre-populator, default 'std'

properties.name: resource.defaultType
properties.description: If using the 'simple' ResourceService, set the default 'type' of discovered resources

properties.name: web.client.data-service
properties.description: If using the 'simple' ResourceService, set the default 'connectionDetail' of discovered resources
